name: Tamagoshii
description:
Virtual Pet Jam entry.

Unfortunately, the game is not finished because I (the programmer) had some urgent personal problems to deal with :/  (It's playable though)

The game has an auto-save feature.

Art and sfx by Ana Yomiell.

Powered by Godot Engine 3.

Requirements: OpenGL 3.3 / OpenGL ES 3.0
